Items.MinutesNote: The Public Advocate (Ms. Gotbaum) put the question whether the Council would agree with and adopt such reports, which were decided in the affirmative by the following vote:

The following files were removed from the General Order Calendar and voted separately:

Int No. 555, Int No. 556-A, LU 434 & Res 892,  LU 435 & Res 893,  LU 436 & Res 894 and
LU 445 & Res 895

See files for individual votes.

At this point, a Proposed Amendment to Int No. 556-A was presented by Council Member Vann which would add a new section 52, renumber current sections 52, 53, 54 as respectively 53, 54, 55; and amend the title to read 52 thoroughfares as opposed to 51.

The new section 52 would re-name Gates Avenue from Classon Avenue to Marcy Avenue as Sonny Abubadike Carson Avenue.

The vote for the Proposed Amendment to Inr No. 556-A was recorded as follows:

At this point, the Speaker (Council Member Quinn) asked for a Moment of Silence in memory of the following individual:

Christine Spigner, 77, wife of former Council Member and Deputy Majority Leader Archie Spigner, who  passed away the morning of May 30, 2007.   Christine and Archie Spigner were married for 58 years.
